definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: It is now the highest-grossing independent British film of all time.
sentences.chinese: 如今，这已成为迄今为止最成功的英国独立电影。

sentences.english: This is the first study to ever report such an association.
sentences.chinese: 这是迄今为止首次报道存在这种相关性。

sentences.english: Can you describe one of the best concerts you have ever seen?
sentences.chinese: 你可以描述一下迄今为止你看过的最好的演唱会吗？

sentences.english: So far, 952 people have agreed to be notified of their test results by text messenge.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，已有952人同意通过短信获知检验结果。

sentences.english: Until recently, there were altogether three Nine Dragon Screens in China.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止在中国总共有三个九龙壁。

sentences.english: There have been no defaults so far, says the company’s founder, Calvin Chin.
sentences.chinese: 距公司创始人陈国权称迄今为止还没有拖欠记录。

sentences.english: Writing in the journal Nature , the team says this is the deepest-living "multi-cellular" organism known to science.
sentences.chinese: 这是迄今为止发现生活在最深地方的多细胞生物。

sentences.english: But they have received little attention on the policy stage so far.
sentences.chinese: 但是迄今为止它们几乎没有在政策舞台上受到重视。

sentences.english: Cheung Chau has been a fishing port for more than a century.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，长洲岛作为渔港的历史已经超过一个世纪。

sentences.english: To date, Google and other companies have acquiesced to Chinese government demands to censor information.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，谷歌和其他公司一直都默许中方审查信息。

sentences.english: The death toll so far appears to be around 25, 000.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，死亡人数已达到25000左右。

sentences.english: Up to now, a bout 40 kinds of Swertia species have been reported.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，约有40种獐牙菜属植物有文献报道。

sentences.english: To date, nobody has broken Kittinger’s altitude record.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，没有人打破基廷格降落高度的纪录。

sentences.english: So far we haven't used high depth dredger .
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，我们没有使用高深入挖泥船。

sentences.english: So far, however, no one is panicking.
sentences.chinese: 但是迄今为止还不需要过度恐慌。

sentences.english: Coenosia is subordinated to Muscidae. So far, 91 species have been found in China.
sentences.chinese: 秽蝇属隶属于蝇科，迄今为止我国已知91种。

definition: in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
one of (sth)/one out of a multitude/one (third, quarter, percent etc)
